prompt: Describe the picture. Reason about the location of a photo. Try to get as many accurate and relevant information as possible. When you have enough information, please finalize the latitude and longitude with utmost accuracy.
system_message: As the world's elite geolocation expert, your mission is to analyze the attached image and navigate through your reasoning to pinpoint the exact geolocation. Detail your analytical process and finalize the latitude and longitude with utmost accuracy.
